Text: I concur. Having to wait several seconds before having to click on a button to see the preview does indeed suck.

pic host pics won't show at all for me since I have scripts disabled on most sites, and I sure as hell won't enable them for a shady ass site like that. 

That would be like going into a prison shower with your hands taped to your ankles and a jar of Vaseline glued to your back. Pretty good odds you are gonna get fucked.
